Language: Starting a new game will overwrite the saved data.
English: Starting a new game will overwrite the saved data.

Language: Are you sure you want to continue?
English: Are you sure you want to continue?
Chinese: 開始新遊戲將會覆蓋存檔，確定要繼續嗎？

English: Starting a new game will overwrite the saved data.
Chinese: 開啟新遊戲將會覆蓋先前的存檔，確定要繼續嗎？
